channel.title: Bandos Boss & Kalphite Queen Help
channel.description: I'm having problems with my Kalphite Queen & General Graardor (Bandos Boss). My KQ doesn't hit high enough, & Graardor wont hit anything at all. But he does attack. If anyone could give me a code to fix these problems & tell me where to put it that would be great. And also if someone could give me a code to spawn the 2nd form of the KQ after the 1st form is dead I would like that too.

item.title: Bandos Boss & Kalphite Queen Help
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Try messing with the NPCHander class.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Boss & Kalphite Queen Help
item.dc:creator: @LilXCj LilXCj
item.description:
@LilXCj wrote:

If you have a NPC folder, you must edit the Max Hits + NPC attack level in it’s npc.java and npccombat.java

To raise it’s defense you have to go into where it handles player vs npc combat and change it’s defense.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Boss & Kalphite Queen Help
item.dc:creator: @Ahyo Ahyo
item.description:
@Ahyo wrote:

umm in order spawn the 2nd kq form try looking at zooscape v1, it does the secound form better nicely. Um also you can look up the monsters in ur files area and look for that true false crap, then look where it says “hit=0” or sumthing like that and change it to whatever. There should also be one for how often they hit that max

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Boss & Kalphite Queen Help
item.dc:creator: @Owner_Of_GdogScape Owner_Of_GdogScape
item.description:
@Owner_Of_GdogScape wrote:

I’m having problems with my Kalphite Queen & General Graardor (Bandos Boss).
My KQ doesn’t hit high enough, & Graardor wont hit anything at all. But he does attack.
If anyone could give me a code to fix these problems & tell me where to put it that would be great.
And also if someone could give me a code to spawn the 2nd form of the KQ after the 1st form is dead I would like that too.

Read full topic
